Reviews.Title: Great for the den or bedroom
Reviews.Author: Ronald W. Hallett
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set from Best Buy as a second lCD tv for my den.The ease of puting it together was a no brainer.Just 4 srews and your done.I found the picture beautiful and it didn't need any adjusting.Sound was another story so I hooked up my surround speakers of which I purchased from BEST BUY FOR AROUND $25. This set was on sale for $249.99.Where can you get a 32" led/lcd for that kind of money?

Reviews.Title: UPDATED SEE ADDITIONAL COMMENTS BELOW Appeared to have been opened and resealed at the Factory BUT GOOD Product
Reviews.Author: C. Bilton "LadyC"
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for...DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT.  It took a couple of months to see all of the flaws.  Constant black square shaped artifacts appearing on the screen for some channels.That White greasy residue mentioned in the first post, well I discovered the greasy agent was apparently used to cover up the extensive damage from what was splashed on it.  Once after the unit is thoroughly cleaned and wipe down , eventually the back and bottom of the unit is COVERED in WHITE SPLOTCHY CIRCULAR spots!  GREAT, to send a used item, repackaged to appear new and ship it out as a new product.I like the Televison, priced right at 259.99 32inch with 1080p GREATDidn't like that I was advised it would not ship until December 19 to early January, 2 weeks later an email was sent that the item was available then within hours 5 or less my card was billed and the item shipped the same day.  Would have been great had I expected this.The unit itself had splash stains of some greasy white residue underneath it with a finger print on the bottom of the framefront as if it had been opened and used a little before it was shipped from the warehouse.Otherwise I'm so far quite satisfied with my purchase.  It has a GREAT Picture quality.  Super Easy Setup.

Reviews.Title: great choice for my purpose
Reviews.Author: JerryAB
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to use as a large monitor with my computer.  So far, I am thrilled with the results.  It is exactly what I was looking for.  The text is crisp and clear and easy to read with my old eyes!  (By the way, for use as a computer monitor, I would never get anything less than a 1080p, regardless of size. Buat make sure your video card handles 1920x1080 resolution.)I haven't hooked it up to cable or DVD player, so I have no opinion on that.  I also have no opinion on using the remote control functions since it was pretty much plug and play for me.  I also don't use the sound.Several years ago, I had a 42" Westinghouse LCD-TV that I used as a TV.  I had no problems with it, so I didn't hesitate to get another Westinghouse at the $249 price.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for use with my gaming desktop, and it works flawlessly. To my dismay I realized I didnt have any hdmi cords when the tv came, so I would have to go buy one. grreeat. Took a look at the back and what do you know, it had a vga port! awesome. Shipping and customer service was great too. It will first estimate that the product wont arrive for a while, but a few days later it will most likely say that it is going to arrive sooner than orignally expected, at least thats what happened in my case. Anyways since I did not think it would ship in time, I called amazon and had them cancel the order. Apparently it was already in the shipping process, but they would tell the carrier that I was going to refuse the shipment. Well next day I look at the tracking, and what do you know its at a station only TWENTY minutes away from my town, but it says it is going to be shipped back to the seller!!! I thought I was screwed. During school I used the online chat feature with a amazon customer service representative, her name was Kelly. Not only was she extremely understanding in nice, she also didnt mind calling fedex herself and explaining the situation. She even let me know that she was on hold, and it would be a couple minutes. Anyways, long story short: She got everything straightened out, and the tv arrived on my door step the next day. The 1080p quality is amazing, there IS a difference between 1080p and 720p, so if you can, go for the 1080p. Im typing the review using the tv/monitor right now.(as for those of you who wonder why in the heck someone would need a monitor this big for a computer, i edit videos and game) In conclusion I was very impressed with the friendliness of amazon customer support, even after me changing my mind they were able to make me happy. awesome. Some of the best support I've ever had from a company.

Reviews.Title: No Complaints
Reviews.Author: Ishmael "cleverlemming"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my mother so she could watch digital television using the antenna I installed on her roof. The fact that it has a built-in tuner was important. I read reviews that were critical of picture quality but broadcast HD looks great to me. This TV is also nice and loud, which was important to my mom as she likes to listen to her programs while she's in the kitchen. I only thing I didn't like about this television was having to contact Westinghouse to get a secret code, which has to be entered using the remote, to scan for broadcast channels. This is a clumsy and inconvenient way to harvest your location. I would buy this television again at the price I paid for it, but it's gone up over a hundred dollars in the last two months, and by seventy five dollars less than a month after I bought it. I've been seeing similar price increases in my wish list items. I'm not sure if this reflects the apparent rise in import prices because of the continuing dilution of US currency or some kind of holiday pricing strategy. Either way, it'd be time for some serious price comparison before I bought another of these.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Bryand
Reviews.Content: Pros: Most people say 720p is good enough at 32", but I can really tell the difference between 1080p and 720p at this size. Especially when you have a ps3 hooked up through an hdmi cable. Games just look awesome on this tv. You must use hdmi cables to get the best quality. Any other connection type will just disappoint, even the component connections. The colors needed adjusting but the tv can easily be enjoyed straight out of the box. The color scheme on this TV are vibrant.  The sound is okay, but like with most TV's, it's better enjoyed with a surround sound system. The controller isn't special but gets the work done.Cons: Connecting the stand is the worse. I don't know if this is common to their TV's but to many parts and screws. A second pair of hands would help when putting the stand on. Sound quality isn't that great, but I did mention it before.Other Thoughts: You can see the limitations of 60hz, but it's adequate for most situations(ie. Movies, gaming, local TV).  The controller needs to be directly pointing at the IR receiver, unlike other tvs where all you need to do is point in the general direction of the TV in order to receive the signal from the controller.

Reviews.Title: Nice HDTV
Reviews.Author: packmule
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV back in early November, 2010 as a second TV. I use it in the back "office" room of my basement apartment. I was on a budget($300) and looking for a 32" and ended up paying $259.99 plus tax for this unit from Wal Mart. I have never owned a Westinghouse brand TV and bought this unit more out of curiosity than anything else. The reviews I read before my purchase have been mostly positive.The TV is easy to set up, the picture quality is excellent. I use this unit for watching cable(A T & T U-Verse) and also watching HD "on demand" movies ordered as rentals through my cable provider.I actually use this TV more weekly than the 37" Vizio in my living room. I would recommend this TV as a "buy" for anyone looking for a 32" flat panel under $300.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture/Great Price
Reviews.Author: Chad M. Warren "AEBoi80"
Reviews.Content: This TV was bought as an upgrade for the 22" in the bedroom.  This tv has great color and is well constructed.  I however did not buy it from Amazon. I got it black friday from Newegg.com  All the same this is a fantastic tv.  Not sure that I would put it in my living room as my primary tv, but if you are looking for an excellent TV for the bedroom I highly recommend this.  My only complaint is that the position of the cable coxaial input is a bit hard to screw on. Make sure you pickup an HDMI cable to connect to your cable/satellite box. (had I done this in the first place I wouldn't have had to deal with the difficult cable coxial input).

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Xbox and Movies
Reviews.Author: Chick Bowdrie
Reviews.Content: I'm really pleased with this TV. This is my first HDTV; just upgraded from a CRT. I use it for playing Xbox 360 games and watching DVDs. The Xbox game I'm playing now (Skyrim) is crisp and clear. 1080p at 60Hz. My DVD movies look great, too. The controls are easy to use, the remote is intuitive and the sound is fine.Some other users complained of the aspect ratio having to be reset every time for wide screen, but I've not experienced that problem. Mine comes up in wide screen every time.I have no complaints, and I wouldn't change anything about this TV.

Reviews.Title: Westinghouse 32 " LCD TV from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect for my needs. The picture is crisp and clear, with incredible color depth.  As a bedroom tv, particulary for the price, it's a great value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin Buckley
Reviews.Content: Great price super picture and never had any problems says it all a good value for the money and easy set up.

Reviews.Title: Okay....
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: We were kind of disappointed in the quality of the picture.  Compared to our other tv with the same pixels, etc...the pic was a lot more fuzzy..less clear.  It is a good tv for the money, I guess.

Reviews.Title: As a TV but not a monitor
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: I attempted to use this as a PC monitor.I previously had a Westinghouse monitor that as 37" and that worked very well for a long time.I ordered this thinking I could do the same.I was unable to use it as a monitor. The HDMI input only gave me a fuzzy image.I replaced with Samsung HD2770 and to be fair the HDMI input on that was not very good either but I could use DVI on the Samsung.So as a TV the picture was great it just did not serve the purpose I needed.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Unit refused to power on day 100. Sent it in for a replacement. 6 weeks later I get an email that they cannot repair it, and replacements are on backorder. They'll happily contact me when the back order clears.Calls get placed. A representative says he'll look into it and get back to me. A few days later no return call.They are being reported to the BBB and the California AG office for fraud. I've owned the unit since mid-August 2011 and have been unable to use it since mid-November. Do the math and ask yourself if that is worth it.It should be very easy to find a better TV and even better customer service by a different TV company.Caveat emptor.

Reviews.Title: Westinghouse
Reviews.Author: Loretta
Reviews.Content: Received this tv two days before I suppose to!  Thanks so much!  Out of the box perfect.  I do wish the sound was a little better but it was a definate value for the money I spent.

Reviews.Title: Don't get this brand... it's cheap and doesn't work
Reviews.Author: R. Weeks
Reviews.Content: This compay is in collusion with the cable companies.  I bought a 32 inch online and received a 40 inch as a gift for Christmas.  I have a coaxil cable from my cable company (and apartment) - and the television makes you get a box to receive any of the channels.  Other televisions (like the Vizio I have) don't make you put in another box.  This television is cheap for a reason.  Forget them.  I will not buy their products any more.  They should have disclosed this in the description.  It's too hard to return online... so I lose... and they've lost a customer for ALL of their products.

ProductInfo.Features:
32" Class (31.5" Diagonal) Widescreen LCD HDTV
Multiple HD Inputs
1080p, 1920 x 1080 Resolution with 16:9 Aspect Ratio
Contains no lead
ProductInfo.Name: Westinghouse VR-3225 31.5-Inch 1080p LCD TV - Black
